name: Soccer Pong (Light Enchanted)
description:
Hello! Welcome to my game! Play classic pong, but there is a twist! A grassy one at least. Play as the paddle on the left and try to get the ball passed the your opponent, the other paddle, or goal keeper if you want to call it that. Your paddle has the ability to move in all 4 directions. Do not move off the map (left or right) unless you want the opponent to get a point!

Controls

  1. W - Up
  2. S - Down
  3. A -  Left
  4. D -  Right
